name: Defender of the Crown: Heroes Live Forever
summary: Defender of the Crown: Heroes Live Forever is a 2007 remake of the classic Risk-like strategy game set in Medieval England.

alternative_names.name: Defender of the Crown: Les Héros Ne Meurent Jamais

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 7 years and over only.
It contains: Violence that is not shown but is implied - Non realistic looking violence towards characters which although human are not very detailed.
